item.name: Latte classic
item.description: A latte is a popular coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk, typically topped with a small amount of foam. It has a creamy texture and a mild coffee flavor, making it a favorite for those who prefer a smoother, less intense coffee experience.

item.name: Iced Latte
item.description: An iced latte is a refreshing coffee drink made with espresso, cold milk, and ice. It's smooth, creamy, and chilled, perfect for a cool caffeine boost.

item.name: Piccolo
item.description: Small but intense espresso-based drink, typically served in a demitasse cup. It consists of a single shot of espresso topped with a small amount of steamed milk, creating a rich, smooth flavor with a slightly creamy texture.

item.name: Cappuccino
item.description: A cappuccino is a classic coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk. It has a rich, bold coffee flavor balanced with a creamy texture and a light, airy foam on top.

item.name: Espresso
item.description: Espresso is a concentrated coffee brewed by forcing hot water through finely ground coffee beans under high pressure. It has a strong, bold flavor and a thick, syrupy consistency, often served in small, 1-ounce shots.
